Question & Options:
What are the relationships and roles of the characters in 'Fifty Shades Freed'?
Options:
A. A) Christian and Ana are newlyweds.
B. B) Hyde attacks Ana out of vengeance.
C. C) Liz is blackmailed by Hyde.
D. D) All of the above

Which characters are involved in the conflict surrounding Ana in *Fifty Shades Freed*?
Options:
A. A) Christian
B. B) Ana
C. C) Hyde
D. D) Liz
Correct Answer: A) Christian, C) Hyde, D) Liz
